author: Staff Reporter
text:
Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (DMK) has alleged that there are more ‘double entries’ in the final electoral rolls that was released recently and demanded action.

A special camp for inclusion of names, deletion, correction and change of address in electoral rolls was conducted in polling centres here on Saturday. Party Central District unit in-charge R. Rajendran visited one of the booths in the city and found names of many electors repeated in the rolls. Addressing the media, he said that double entries was more in the rolls and demanded rectification. He also said that names of dead persons were also found in the rolls and demanded removal.

Collector V. Sampath along with Corporation Commissioner K.R. Selvaraj visited the booths in Salem North and Salem South.
title: DMK alleges double entries in electoral rolls
